name: Heroes of Citole
description:
An entire Earldom has vanished. As a knight of a neighboring Duchy, you, alongside a few others, have been tasked with investigating this disappearance, finding those responsible and bringing them to justice. 

Heroes of Citole is a fantasy adventure visual novel full of magic, mystery and political intrigue. The game is full of branching paths, as well as diversions outside of your main objective, some of which could be more significant than they first appear...

The game is episodic and currently in development. You can play the first chapter here. I'd really appreciate it if you give it a try and let me know what you think!
